reviewText: I now have the final part of the trilogy.  The quality is great and this was the best price I've found.
The movie had alot of neat fight scenes in it. Classic blood spewing. I thought it was a good movie.
This film is a classic and the sequel to another great film Trail of blood. Check it out.

If you are looking for ANIME films, this isn't one.  It's Japanese or whatever, but its no way close to ANIME!!

Yo AMAZON!!! Get a clue.... if its live action, it isn't ANIME!
